alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 11:30AM CDT until September 23 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Jackson County in west central Missouri... * Until noon CDT. * At 1128 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Raytown, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kansas City, Independence, Lee`s Summit, Blue Springs, Leawood, Raytown, Grandview, Grain Valley, Sugar Creek, Lake Lotawana, Courtney, Lake Tapawingo and Unity Village. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 1 and 22. Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 1 and 4. Interstate 470 between mile markers 0 and 16. Interstate 435 between mile markers 57 and 75. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
